DOC.brief_summary: Evaluation preference three female condom ( FC ) .
DOC.brief_title: Assessing Preference 3 Female Condoms : A Comparative Evaluation PATH Woman 's Condom , FC2 Reddy 6
DOC.detailed_description: The primary goal study identify female condom prefer study participant . This provide USAID data make informed decision regard female condom purchase . The study conduct three part . The objective Part 1 familiarize participant three FC type , minimize learn curve effect subsequent phase study , gather information participant demographic , FC acceptability , device function , safety , preference condom type , use male condom time period . The objective Part 2 determine actual , `` unstated '' `` unbiased '' preference particular type FC . The objective Part 3 identify reason preference particular FC type document detail surround product use/non-use .
DOC.criteria: All woman enrol research must meet follow selection criterion : 1. must least 18 year age . 2. must literate ( able read newspaper letter easily ) . 3. must sexually active ( define least two vaginal coital act per week abstinent month prior enrollment ) . 4. must exclusive ( monogamous ) sexual relationship spouse partner participate research study . 5. must sexual relationship partner least 6 month . 6. must without evidence STI determine syndromic diagnosis vaginal examination . 7. must hormonal nonbarrier contraception ( e.g . OCs , injectables , IUD , tubal sterilization postmenopausal—defined 12 month period ) . 8. must willing give informed consent . 9. must able complete condom use log . 10. must willing use study condom direct . 11. must willing adhere followup schedule study procedure . 12. must successfully complete give phase study advance subsequent phase ( e.g . successfully complete Part 1 advance Part 2 , etc. ) . 13. must willing provide research study staff address , phone number locator information participate study . 14. must willing participate study six month . 1. must sex worker . 2. must pregnant ( determined pregnancy test ) plan pregnancy time research study . 3. must breastfeed . 4. must know sensitivity allergy latex , polyurethane , vaginal/sexual lubricant lubricant use condom .
